tcg

Class AbstractAttack

  • java.lang.Object
    • tcg.AbstractAttack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAttack
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElectricAttack, FightingAttack, FireAttack, GrassAttack, PsychicAttack, WaterAttack

    public abstract class AbstractAttack
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAttack
    Base class for all the attacks. Contains the method to access the attack's properties: name, base damage, descriptive text and the cost associated.
